00026 #ifndef CLIENTVERSION_H
00027 #define CLIENTVERSION_H
00028

00030     #include "config.h" // Needed for VERSION
00031 #endif
00032 
00033 
00034 // eMule version used on old MuleInfo packet (unimportant).
00035 #define CURRENT_VERSION_SHORT           0x47
00036 
00037 // This is only used to server login. It has no real "version" meaning anymore.
00038 #define EDONKEYVERSION              0x3c 
00039 
00040 // aMule version 
00041 
00042 // No more Mod Version unless we're cvs
00043 
00044 // RELEASERS: REMOVE THE DEFINE ON THE RELEASES, PLEASE
00045 // AND FIX THE MOD_VERSION_LONG
00046 
00047 /* #undef __SVN__ */
00048 
00049 #ifndef VERSION
00050     #define VERSION "2.3.1"
00051 #endif
00052 
00053 #ifdef __SVN__
00054     #define MOD_VERSION_LONG        wxT("aMule SVN")
00055 #else
00056     #define MOD_VERSION_LONG        (wxT("aMule ") wxT(VERSION))
00057 #endif
00058

00060 #define VERSION_MIN     3
